ms_galicia: Not all can afford them either but if you have an extra 30-40 bucks the menstrual cup is a great investment. It saves your vagina from any toxic chemicals that are in the products. Just a little information for those who don’t want, like the products. The menstrual cup eliminates that blood spell. It can be a little messy at first until you get familiar with it. Also, if you are one that isn’t comfortable with touching yourself or having blood on your fingers, this product would not be a good option for you. I could not go back to sanitary products that are on the market. I hope this information helps someone.
